app.name: Sonic Mania
app.short_description: By the Mania for the Mania
app.long_description: Notes: * Put your 'Data.rsdk' file in a folder called 'v5' in a folder called 'RSDK' on the root of the SD card. The full path should be '[sd card]/RSDK/v5/Data.rsdk'. * If you own the Sonic Mania Plus DLC, then you can enable it through editing the 'RSDK/v5/Settings.ini' file, by setting the 'dlcEnabled' variable to 'y'. * To change the username that pops up in the main menu, set the 'username' variable in 'RSDK/v5/Settings.ini' to the name you'd like.
